trans-unit.source: Continous export of telemetry from Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Continous export of telemetry from Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Export diagnostic and usage data to storage in Microsoft Azure, and download it from there.
trans-unit.target: Export diagnostic and usage data to storage in Microsoft Azure, and download it from there.

trans-unit.source: Export telemetry from Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Export telemetry from Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Want to do some customised analysis on your telemetry?
trans-unit.target: Want to do some customised analysis on your telemetry?

trans-unit.source: Or maybe you'd like an email alert on events with specific properties?
trans-unit.target: Or maybe you'd like an email alert on events with specific properties?

trans-unit.source: Continuous Export is ideal for this.
trans-unit.target: Continuous Export is ideal for this.

trans-unit.source: The events you see in the Application Insights portal can be exported to storage in Microsoft Azure in JSON format.
trans-unit.target: The events you see in the Application Insights portal can be exported to storage in Microsoft Azure in JSON format.

trans-unit.source: From there you can download your data and write whatever code you need to process it.
trans-unit.target: From there you can download your data and write whatever code you need to process it.

trans-unit.source: Continuous Export is available in the free trial period and on the <link><linkText>Standard and Premium pricing plans</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Continuous Export is available in the free trial period and on the <link><linkText>Standard and Premium pricing plans</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: (If you just want to do a <link><linkText>one-off export</linkText><title></title></link> of what you see on a metrics or search blade, click Export at the top of the blade.)
trans-unit.target: (If you just want to do a <link><linkText>one-off export</linkText><title></title></link> of what you see on a metrics or search blade, click Export at the top of the blade.)

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html> Set up Continuous Export
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html> Set up Continuous Export

trans-unit.source: On your application's Overview blade in the Application Insights portal, open Continuous Export:
trans-unit.target: On your application's Overview blade in the Application Insights portal, open Continuous Export:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Scroll down and click Continuous Export</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Scroll down and click Continuous Export</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Add an export, and choose an <link><linkText>Azure storage account</linkText><title></title></link> where you want to put the data:
trans-unit.target: Add an export, and choose an <link><linkText>Azure storage account</linkText><title></title></link> where you want to put the data:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Click Add, Export Destination, Storage account, and then either create a new store or choose an existing store</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Click Add, Export Destination, Storage account, and then either create a new store or choose an existing store</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Choose the event types you'd like to export:
trans-unit.target: Choose the event types you'd like to export:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Click Choose event types</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Click Choose event types</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Once you've created your export, it starts going.
trans-unit.target: Once you've created your export, it starts going.

trans-unit.source: (You only get data that arrives after you create the export.)
trans-unit.target: (You only get data that arrives after you create the export.)

trans-unit.source: There can be a delay of about an hour before data appears in the blob.
trans-unit.target: There can be a delay of about an hour before data appears in the blob.

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the event types later, just edit the export:
trans-unit.target: If you want to change the event types later, just edit the export:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Click Choose event types</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Click Choose event types</linkText>

trans-unit.source: To stop the stream, click Disable.
trans-unit.target: To stop the stream, click Disable.

trans-unit.source: When you click Enable again, the stream will restart with new data.
trans-unit.target: When you click Enable again, the stream will restart with new data.

trans-unit.source: You won't get the data that arrived in the portal while export was disabled.
trans-unit.target: You won't get the data that arrived in the portal while export was disabled.

trans-unit.source: To stop the stream permanently, delete the export.
trans-unit.target: To stop the stream permanently, delete the export.

trans-unit.source: Doing so doesn't delete your data from storage.
trans-unit.target: Doing so doesn't delete your data from storage.

trans-unit.source: Can't add or change an export?
trans-unit.target: Can't add or change an export?

trans-unit.source: To add or change exports, you need Owner, Contributor or Application Insights Contributor access rights.
trans-unit.target: To add or change exports, you need Owner, Contributor or Application Insights Contributor access rights.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Learn about roles[roles]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Learn about roles[roles]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html> What events do you get?
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html> What events do you get?

trans-unit.source: The exported data is the raw telemetry we receive from your application, except that we add location data which we calculate from the client IP address.
trans-unit.target: The exported data is the raw telemetry we receive from your application, except that we add location data which we calculate from the client IP address.

trans-unit.source: Other calculated metrics are not included.
trans-unit.target: Other calculated metrics are not included.

trans-unit.source: For example, we don't export average CPU utilisation, but we do export the raw telemetry from which the average is computed.
trans-unit.target: For example, we don't export average CPU utilisation, but we do export the raw telemetry from which the average is computed.

trans-unit.source: The data also includes the results of any <link><linkText>availability web tests</linkText><title></title></link> you have set up.
trans-unit.target: The data also includes the results of any <link><linkText>availability web tests</linkText><title></title></link> you have set up.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html> Inspect the data
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html> Inspect the data

trans-unit.source: To inspect Azure storage in Visual Studio, open View, Cloud Explorer.
trans-unit.target: To inspect Azure storage in Visual Studio, open View, Cloud Explorer.

trans-unit.source: (If you don't have that menu command, you need to install the Azure SDK: Open the New Project dialog, expand Visual C#/Cloud and choose Get Microsoft Azure SDK for .NET.)
trans-unit.target: (If you don't have that menu command, you need to install the Azure SDK: Open the New Project dialog, expand Visual C#/Cloud and choose Get Microsoft Azure SDK for .NET.)

trans-unit.source: When you open your blob store, you'll see a container with a set of blob files.
trans-unit.target: When you open your blob store, you'll see a container with a set of blob files.

trans-unit.source: The URI of each file derived from your Application Insights resource name, its instrumentation key, telemetry-type/date/time.
trans-unit.target: The URI of each file derived from your Application Insights resource name, its instrumentation key, telemetry-type/date/time.

trans-unit.source: (The resource name is all lowercase, and the instrumentation key omits dashes.)
trans-unit.target: (The resource name is all lowercase, and the instrumentation key omits dashes.)

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Inspect the blob store with a suitable tool</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Inspect the blob store with a suitable tool</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The date and time are UTC and are when the telemetry was deposited in the store - not the time it was generated.
trans-unit.target: The date and time are UTC and are when the telemetry was deposited in the store - not the time it was generated.

trans-unit.source: So if you write code to download the data, it can move linearly through the data.
trans-unit.target: So if you write code to download the data, it can move linearly through the data.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html> Data format
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html> Data format

trans-unit.source: Each blob is a text file that contains multiple '\n'-separated rows.
trans-unit.target: Each blob is a text file that contains multiple '\n'-separated rows.

trans-unit.source: Each row is an unformatted JSON document.
trans-unit.target: Each row is an unformatted JSON document.

trans-unit.source: If you want to sit and stare at it, open it in Visual Studio and choose Edit, Advanced, Format File:
trans-unit.target: If you want to sit and stare at it, open it in Visual Studio and choose Edit, Advanced, Format File:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>View the telemetry with a suitable tool</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>View the telemetry with a suitable tool</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Time durations are in ticks, where 10 000 ticks = 1ms.
trans-unit.target: Time durations are in ticks, where 10 000 ticks = 1ms.

trans-unit.source: For example, these values show a time of 10ms to send a request from the browser, 30ms to receive it, and 1.8s to process the page in the browser:
trans-unit.target: For example, these values show a time of 10ms to send a request from the browser, 30ms to receive it, and 1.8s to process the page in the browser:

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Detailed data model reference for the property types and values.</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Detailed data model reference for the property types and values.</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Processing the data
trans-unit.target: Processing the data

trans-unit.source: On a small scale, you can write some code to pull apart your data, read it into a spreadsheet, and so on.
trans-unit.target: On a small scale, you can write some code to pull apart your data, read it into a spreadsheet, and so on.

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: For example:

trans-unit.source: For a larger code sample, see <link><linkText>using a worker role[exportasa]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For a larger code sample, see <link><linkText>using a worker role[exportasa]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Delete your old data
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Delete your old data

trans-unit.source: Please note that you are responsible for managing your storage capacity and deleting the old data if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Please note that you are responsible for managing your storage capacity and deleting the old data if necessary.

trans-unit.source: If you regenerate your storage key...
trans-unit.target: If you regenerate your storage key...

trans-unit.source: If you change the key to your storage, continuous export will stop working.
trans-unit.target: If you change the key to your storage, continuous export will stop working.

trans-unit.source: You'll see a notification in your Azure account.
trans-unit.target: You'll see a notification in your Azure account.

trans-unit.source: Open the Continuous Export blade and edit your export.
trans-unit.target: Open the Continuous Export blade and edit your export.

trans-unit.source: Edit the Export Destination, but just leave the same storage selected.
trans-unit.target: Edit the Export Destination, but just leave the same storage selected.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to confirm.
trans-unit.target: Click OK to confirm.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Edit the continuous export, open and close thee export destination.</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Edit the continuous export, open and close thee export destination.</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The continuous export will restart.
trans-unit.target: The continuous export will restart.

trans-unit.source: Export to Power BI
trans-unit.target: Export to Power BI

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Microsoft Power BI</linkText><title></title></link> presents your data in rich and varied visuals, with the ability to bring together information from multiple sources.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Microsoft Power BI</linkText><title></title></link> presents your data in rich and varied visuals, with the ability to bring together information from multiple sources.

trans-unit.source: You can stream telemetry data about the performance and usage of your apps from Application Insights to Power BI.
trans-unit.target: You can stream telemetry data about the performance and usage of your apps from Application Insights to Power BI.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Stream Application Insights to Power BI</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Stream Application Insights to Power BI</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Sample of Power BI view of Application Insights usage data</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Sample of Power BI view of Application Insights usage data</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Export to SQL
trans-unit.target: Export to SQL

trans-unit.source: Another option is to move the data to a SQL database, where you can perform more powerful analytics.
trans-unit.target: Another option is to move the data to a SQL database, where you can perform more powerful analytics.

trans-unit.source: We have samples showing two alternative methods of moving the data from the blob storage to a database:
trans-unit.target: We have samples showing two alternative methods of moving the data from the blob storage to a database:

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Export to SQL using a worker role[exportcode]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Export to SQL using a worker role[exportcode]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Export to SQL using Stream Analytics[exportasa]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Export to SQL using Stream Analytics[exportasa]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: On larger scales, consider <link><linkText>HDInsight</linkText><title></title></link> - Hadoop clusters in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: On larger scales, consider <link><linkText>HDInsight</linkText><title></title></link> - Hadoop clusters in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: HDInsight provides a variety of technologies for managing and analyzing big data.
trans-unit.target: HDInsight provides a variety of technologies for managing and analyzing big data.

trans-unit.source: Q & A
trans-unit.target: Q & A

trans-unit.source: But all I want is a one-time download of a chart.
trans-unit.target: But all I want is a one-time download of a chart.

trans-unit.source: Yes, you can do that.
trans-unit.target: Yes, you can do that.

trans-unit.source: At the top of the blade, click <link><linkText>Export Data</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: At the top of the blade, click <link><linkText>Export Data</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: I set up an export, but there's no data in my store.
trans-unit.target: I set up an export, but there's no data in my store.

trans-unit.source: Did Application Insights receive any telemetry from your app since you set up the export?
trans-unit.target: Did Application Insights receive any telemetry from your app since you set up the export?

trans-unit.source: You'll only receive new data.
trans-unit.target: You'll only receive new data.

trans-unit.source: I tried to set up an export, but was denied access
trans-unit.target: I tried to set up an export, but was denied access

trans-unit.source: If the account is owned by your organization, you have to be a member of the owners or contributors groups.
trans-unit.target: If the account is owned by your organization, you have to be a member of the owners or contributors groups.

trans-unit.source: Can I export straight to my own on-premises store?
trans-unit.target: Can I export straight to my own on-premises store?

trans-unit.source: No, sorry.
trans-unit.target: No, sorry.

trans-unit.source: Our export engine currently only works with Azure storage at this time.
trans-unit.target: Our export engine currently only works with Azure storage at this time.

trans-unit.source: Is there any limit to the amount of data you put in my store?
trans-unit.target: Is there any limit to the amount of data you put in my store?

trans-unit.source: No.
trans-unit.target: No.

trans-unit.source: We'll keep pushing data in until you delete the export.
trans-unit.target: We'll keep pushing data in until you delete the export.

trans-unit.source: We'll stop if we hit the outer limits for blob storage, but that's pretty huge.
trans-unit.target: We'll stop if we hit the outer limits for blob storage, but that's pretty huge.

trans-unit.source: It's up to you to control how much storage you use.
trans-unit.target: It's up to you to control how much storage you use.

trans-unit.source: How many blobs should I see in the storage?
trans-unit.target: How many blobs should I see in the storage?

trans-unit.source: For every data type you selected to export, a new blob is created every minute (if data is available).
trans-unit.target: For every data type you selected to export, a new blob is created every minute (if data is available).

trans-unit.source: In addition, for applications with high traffic, additional partition units are allocated.
trans-unit.target: In addition, for applications with high traffic, additional partition units are allocated.

trans-unit.source: In this case each unit creates a blob every minute.
trans-unit.target: In this case each unit creates a blob every minute.

trans-unit.source: I regenerated the key to my storage or changed the name of the container, and now the export doesn't work.
trans-unit.target: I regenerated the key to my storage or changed the name of the container, and now the export doesn't work.

trans-unit.source: Edit the export and open the export destination blade.
trans-unit.target: Edit the export and open the export destination blade.

trans-unit.source: Leave the same storage selected as before, and click OK to confirm.
trans-unit.target: Leave the same storage selected as before, and click OK to confirm.

trans-unit.source: Export will restart.
trans-unit.target: Export will restart.

trans-unit.source: If the change was within the past few days, you won't lose data.
trans-unit.target: If the change was within the past few days, you won't lose data.

trans-unit.source: Can I pause the export?
trans-unit.target: Can I pause the export?

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: Yes.

trans-unit.source: Click Disable.
trans-unit.target: Click Disable.

trans-unit.source: Code samples
trans-unit.target: Code samples

trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Stream Application Insights to Power BI</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Export to SQL using Stream Analytics[exportasa]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Detailed data model reference for the property types and values.</linkText><title></title></link>
